questions.question: Considering the overall layout, what is the primary function conveyed by the prominent text and numerical data presented in a structured tabular format?

Examining the central area, what key nutritional parameter is prominently displayed in large font, indicating energy content?
Looking at the detailed breakdown of fats, what type of fat is listed separately from total and saturated fats?
In the carbohydrate section, what element is listed to indicate indigestible plant matter?
Regarding sugars, what specific type of sugar is highlighted in relation to its quantity?
What macronutrient, essential for growth and repair, is listed after the carbohydrate details?
Moving to the vitamin section, what fat-soluble vitamin is quantified, important for bone health?
In the mineral section, which essential element is included in the table, vital for red blood cell formation?
What is the final mineral listed in the table, contributing to fluid balance?
Observing the percentages adjacent to each nutrient value, what is indicated by the numbers, pertaining to dietary intake?

What is the color primarily used for the text throughout the nutrition information panel?
What is the overall shape of the nutrition facts panel presented in the image?
